name: Resumption of booking of mails destined to Israel

details.subject: - Resumption of booking of mails destined to Israel.
details.author: Dr. Gaurav Kumar Saini, Director (IR & GB)
details.recipient: All Heads of Circles CEPT with the request to upload this O.M. on India Post website and enable the booking of all category of mails (EMS, Letter & Parcel) for Israel in the POS, immediatly.
details.next_action: upload O.M. on India Post website

name: Resumption of booking of mails destined to Israel

details.subject: - Resumption of booking of mails destined to Israel.
details.directive: The undersigned is directed to inform that the previous order of even no. dated 06.08.2024 regarding suspension of booking of mails destined to Israel has been withdrawn with immediate effect.
details.request: It is therefore requested that the booking of mails destined to Israel may kindly be resumed. The routing of flights in IPS software has also been enabled in this regardy
details.authorisation: Issued with the approval of the Competent Authority.
details.ceo_request: CEPT with the request to upload this O.M. on India Post website and enable the booking of all category of mails (EMS, Letter & Parcel) for Israel in the POS, immediatly.

name: Public Notice: Resumption of International Mail Booking to Israel

details.author: Dr. Gaurav Kiimar Saini
details.title: Public Notice: Resumption of International Mail Booking to Israel
